CmdLine: set -ex; 		fetchDeps=' 		ca-certificates 		wget 		dirmngr gnupg 	'; 	apt-get update; 	apt-get install -y --no-install-recommends $fetchDeps; 	rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/*; 		dpkgArch="$(dpkg --print-architecture | awk -F- '{ print $NF }')"; 	wget -O /usr/local/bin/gosu "https://github.com/tianon/gosu/releases/download/$GOSU_VERSION/gosu-$dpkgArch"; 	wget -O /usr/local/bin/gosu.asc "https://github.com/tianon/gosu/releases/download/$GOSU_VERSION/gosu-$dpkgArch.asc"; 		export GNUPGHOME="$(mktemp -d)"; 	gpg --keyserver ha.pool.sks-keyservers.net --recv-keys B42F6819007F00F88E364FD4036A9C25BF357DD4; 	gpg --batch --verify /usr/local/bin/gosu.asc /usr/local/bin/gosu; 	rm -r "$GNUPGHOME" /usr/local/bin/gosu.asc; 		chmod +x /usr/local/bin/gosu; 	gosu nobody true;     chmod +x /usr/local/bin/entrypoint.sh; 		apt-get purge -y --auto-remove $fetchDeps
Commands.Name: run
